sub_title: Helping YOU do good in the world 🌍
summary:
Armed with an insatiable curiosity and robust self-motivation, I've navigated diverse career paths - always within the realm of NGOs or social enterprises, finding success and fulfillment at each juncture.

Boasting over 25 years of experience in the NGO sector, I'm a business strategist with a burning passion for driving social change. I specialize in fundraising, marketing, and management, providing comprehensive solutions for development organizations to magnify their impact.

As a self-proclaimed do-gooder, I thrive in helping organizations unlock their potential to change the world. However, don't mistake my mission-driven mindset for softness - I adopt a no-nonsense approach to create tangible, lasting improvements.

If you're driven by the desire to make this world a better place and seek a partner who can provide strategic insights and robust solutions, let's join forces and set the wheels of change in motion!

 #Fundraising #BusinessDevelopment #socialEnterprise #copywriter  #creativewriter #communicationsspecialist #Proposalwriting #marketing #charity #Publicrelations #nonprofit

profile_positions.description:
🌍 Change Catalyst & Founder of Communicologists Today: Amplifying Impact through Strategic Communication

💡 Visionary Founder: Launched Communicologists Today with an audacious goal - to create a consultancy that makes a difference. Not just for our clients, but for society as a whole.

🤝 Impact Facilitator: Have had the privilege of partnering with countless non-profits and social enterprises, providing the springboard they need to enhance visibility, expand funding sources, and deliver impactful e-learning programs.

💬 Communication Strategists: Our strength lies not just in our comprehensive suite of communication, marketing, and fundraising solutions but also in our approach. We believe in the power of storytelling and strive to help organizations narrate their unique stories in compelling ways.

🏆 Performance Enablers: From securing vital bids to orchestrating emotionally resonant campaigns, we've championed NGOs in standing out online and forging deeper connections with their audience.

🎓 E-Learning Pioneers: Alongside our tailored fundraising and communication strategies, we offer meticulously designed e-learning courses to meet the specific needs of our clients.

🎯 Impact-First Leaders: The pride of our journey is witnessing the transformative ripple effect of our work, as NGOs and social enterprises broaden their reach, heighten their impact, and progress their missions.

💪 Advocate for Effective Communication: Each day, I witness the transformative power of effective communication, as our clients triumph in their endeavors - validating our belief and driving us to deliver more.

If you're ignited by your mission and seek a partner who can amplify your message, enhance your visibility, and empower you to achieve your goals, let's connect.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
📈 Marketing Mastery:

🎯 Lead Generation Dynamo: Engineered strategic marketing mix, supercharging lead generation by 27%.

🔍 SEO Wizard: Unveiled an aggressive SEO plan, rocketing our Moz score by 56% and fueling a 42% rise in organic website conversions.

📱 User Experience Architect: Conceived a refreshed website and mobile UX, driving a 29% surge in conversion rates and slashing bounce rates by 21%.

📡 Holistic Marketer: Choreographed a blend of digital, traditional, and social media marketing strategies, complemented by email nurturing campaigns and communication plans.

🖊️ Thought Leader: Authored white papers and abstracts, and led highly attended webinars, elevating SCOPEinsight's reputation as a sector leader.

🛠️ Product Development Ally: Supported product evolution with SCOPEinsight events, explanatory webinars, trial sessions, and product launches. Gathered crucial feedback on tools, methodologies, and strategic considerations.

🎁 Sales Enablement: Designed compelling brochures, presentations, and other sales support materials, fueling the effectiveness of our sales team.

💼 Business Development Expertise:

🤝 Strategic Relationship Cultivator: Developed essential partnerships to boost donor-led initiatives.

📜 Proposal Maestro: Authored persuasive proposals, and developed a 'shelf language' for streamlined proposal submissions.

📋 Process Innovator: Established and enforced robust bidding procedures, supporting colleagues in proposal development.
profile_positions.title: Marketing & Development Director

profile_positions.description:
⚡ Results-Driven Business Development Leader ⚡

🎯 Mission and Goals: With the management team, contributed to developing organizational goals, targets, and strategic fundraising plans to secure sustainable growth and profitability.

💼 Strategic Communications: Skillfully stewarded the conception, development, and execution of the company's comprehensive communications plan, ensuring brand consistency and reach.

🔍 Business Intelligence Hub: Proactively served as a key resource, undertaking rigorous analysis and synthesis of crucial data to predict and prepare for new business opportunities.

🌐 Relationship Management: Forged and nurtured strategic partnerships, solidifying our network and creating a robust ecosystem of potential collaborators.

🎓 Team Empowerment: Acted as a mentor and guide to regional offices, imparting Business Development wisdom, fostering an environment of shared learning and growth.

🖋️ Master Storyteller: Principal author of persuasive communications and proposals, winning stakeholder hearts and minds with compelling narratives.

💰 Financial Achievements: Strategically positioned the organization to excel in its industry, successfully doubling revenue and enhancing fiscal performance.
profile_positions.title: Business Development and Communications Director

profile_positions.description:
💡 Dynamic Business Development Strategist 💡

📈 Portfolio Expansion: Demonstrated stellar strategic acumen by driving a 25% portfolio expansion, thus solidifying our financial growth and market position.

🌍 Global Opportunity Hunter: Scoured the global market and a diverse donor pool, pinpointing untapped opportunities perfectly aligned with donor priorities.

🔍 Business Intelligence Hub: Functioned as a pivotal resource, adeptly analyzing, synthesizing, and disseminating advance intelligence for new business development.

🗓️ Strategic Planning Maestro: Sculpted annual and quarterly strategic plans for business development, tailoring action plans for specific opportunities to ensure optimal outcomes.

🤝 Client Relationship Builder: Amplified our client base, reinforcing efforts to maintain and expand our network of key contacts in funding agencies, with a particular focus on health and pharmaceutical supply chain funding.

🎯 Technical Approach Developer: Devised marketable technical strategies, ensuring our offerings remain cutting-edge and competitive.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Consultant

profile_positions.description:
🌟 Pioneering Leader at a High-Impact Consultancy 🌟

Spearheading a dedicated team of 6 consultants, we are the secret weapon powering non-profit organizations including INGOs, CBOs, Universities, and Hospitals. We provide a comprehensive suite of services tailored to the unique needs of the non-profit sector:

🔍 Foundation Fundraising: We delve into the landscape, strategize, and craft compelling proposals, fueling your funding goals.

💼 Institutional Fundraising: We're masters of the institutional funding landscape, conducting competitive analyses, carving out strategic approaches, and authoring persuasive proposals to garner substantial support.

🎯 Individual Fundraising: We craft customized communication plans, harnessing demographic and other market segmentation data, to engage your donor base effectively.

🌐 Brand and Product Development: We breathe life into your brand and product visions, shaping your organization's identity and portfolio for maximum impact.

📡 Communications Strategy: We develop comprehensive communication strategies that resonate with your target audience, amplifying your message and your mission.

🎉 Event & Campaign Creation: We design, develop and execute captivating events and campaigns that mobilize support and foster community engagement.
profile_positions.title: Principal

profile_positions.description:
💼 Strategic Pioneer for ICCO's U.S. Presence

🚀 Establishment Leadership: Trailblazed the initiation of ICCO's presence in the U.S, laying the groundwork for our successful penetration into this key market.

👥 Board Architect: Handpicked an exceptional roster for the Board of Directors, pooling together a powerhouse of talent and influence.

🛠️ Foundation Builder: Instrumental in creating a solid foundation for success in fundraising, marketing, and strategic communications across the U.S. landscape.

🤝 Partnership Weaver: Offered expert guidance in identifying, forging, and nurturing impactful partnerships with U.S.-based organizations and donors.

🎯 USG Opportunity Spotter: Assisted regional offices to spot, analyze, and seize lucrative USG opportunities, bolstering our competitive edge.

💰 Fundraising Strategist: Developed and orchestrated the U.S. fundraising strategy, focusing on USG, Corporations, and foundations, driving financial growth and sustainability.

🌐 Relationship Guru: Built and fostered high-level relationships, ensuring enduring partnership support through the strength of our professional network.

📣 Brand Ambassador: Served as ICCO's U.S. figurehead in internal and external forums, championing our mission, values, and vision.

🔮 Strategic Visionary: Led initiatives in strategic positioning, grant development, and communications to augment ICCO's brand image, build new constituencies, and rally increasing support for ICCO's cause.
profile_positions.title: VP & Director of US Institutional Relations

profile_positions.description:
🚀 Driving Force Behind Vision 2015 Implementation at Project HOPE

🎯 Public Sector Strategy Maestro: Championed the execution of Project HOPE's public sector business development strategy, ensuring alignment with our overarching vision.

💰 Fundraising Champion: Designed and enacted ambitious fundraising goals for the department, including an impressive 100% surge in USAID awards.

📜 Policy Architect: Played an integral role in crafting the policies and procedures that now underpin our business development endeavors, enhancing organizational efficiency and effectiveness.

🎓 Mentor and Guide: Provided pivotal mentorship to staff (at both field and headquarters) on pre-positioning and bid response, fostering a culture of shared knowledge and growth.

🔍 Capture Management Leader: Led the charge in capture management for large procurements, while maintaining a vigilant oversight on all business development activities.

📝 Compliance Overseer: Developed meticulous funder compliance protocols, ensuring alignment with donor expectations and regulatory standards.

🏆 Quality Assurance Guardian: Ensured each proposal was of the highest quality and met donor needs, driving our reputation for excellence and responsiveness.

🌐 Innovative Product Developer: Collaborated with senior technical advisors, the Global Health and Development, and Communication departments to conceive and promote marketable products, leveraging Project HOPE's rich experience and expertise.
profile_positions.title: Acting Sr Director & Director Business Development

profile_positions.description:
💼 Strategic Guide and Business Development Maestro for West Africa

🌍 Regional Strategy Navigator: Empowered and guided the crafting of regional business development strategies, paving the way for sustainable growth and regional influence.

🔍 Opportunity Cartographer: Specialized in mapping out exciting new opportunities in West African countries, unearthing potential in untapped markets.

📘 Business Intelligence Hub: Acted as a pivotal resource for analyzing, synthesizing, and disseminating cutting-edge information on new business developments.

🤝 Partnership Advisor: Provided expert recommendations on potential partners to engage, systematically vetting new and existing international and local partners for alignment with our mission and goals.

🎯 Bid Facilitator: Played a key role in facilitating bid decisions in response to donor solicitations, driving the win-rate and expanding our funding sources.

📋 Proposal Manager: Stepped up as Proposal Manager on regional or country bilaterals, overseeing the creation of persuasive narratives that resonated with our partners.

🎓 Mentor: Mentored country teams on crafting compelling proposal pieces and strategic positioning to win awards, nurturing a winning mindset across the organization.

🔎 Talent Scout: Identified and recruited proposal personnel, strengthening our team with the talent needed to drive our mission forward.
profile_positions.title: West & Central African Regional Liaison, New Program Development

profile_positions.description:
🗺️ Program Leadership: Delivered strategic leadership for the seamless management and growth of our programs in Benin, Madagascar, and Rwanda.

💡 Portfolio Expander: Took on the challenge of growing our portfolios in each country, driving new opportunities and increased funding.

🤝 Partnership Facilitator: Fostered effective planning and implementation through collaborative decision making with diverse partners and stakeholders.

📊 Performance Tracker: Managed the tracking of indicators and results, ensuring transparency and data-driven decision making.

💰 Financial Steward: Oversaw the financial management of the program, safeguarding our resources and ensuring financial sustainability.

🔊 Communication Liaison: Maintained open lines of communication with partners and donors, coordinating and supporting the program's financial and administrative functions.

🎓 Mentor and Supervisor: Provided mentorship and supervision to our staff, nurturing their growth and professional development.

📝 Research Publisher: Authored and published articles on program results in peer-reviewed journals, web communications, workshops, and international conferences, contributing to global knowledge in our field.

🎙️ Program Ambassador: Represented our country programs at high-level meetings in the U.S. and in-country with the Ministry of Health, advocating for our mission and objectives.

🔬 Technical Leader: Provided technical leadership, direction, and support to key projects, driving our impact and innovation.
profile_positions.title: Senior Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
🌍 Pioneer of Project HOPE's In-Country Presence

🏢 Establishment Pioneer: Spearheaded the establishment of Project HOPE's footprint in Namibia, paving the way for the organization's impactful interventions in the region.

👥 Team Leader: Commanded a dynamic team of 15 staff and collaborated with various partner organizations, cultivating a culture of teamwork and mutual respect.

🤝 Relationship Cultivator: Fostered robust working relationships with the U.S. Ambassador, donors, and partners, solidifying a network of support and cooperation.

🎯 Strategic Navigator: Set the strategic direction to achieve fundraising goals in Namibia and beyond, ensuring alignment with the organization's mission and objectives.

📑 Compliance Guardian: Ensured stringent compliance with grant requirements, safeguarding our commitments to donors and beneficiaries.

📊 Program Reporter: Diligently reported on annual program targets and developed comprehensive workplans, fostering transparency and operational efficiency.

🔎 Talent Spotter: Hired program staff, crafted scopes of work, contracts, and critically evaluated performance, reinforcing the organization's human capital.

🚀 Business Development Strategist: Orchestrated strategic business development plans, excelled at proposal writing, and managed post-grant transitions, driving growth and sustainability.

🌐 Collaborative Partner: Worked in close coordination with professional organizations and Ministries to attain program objectives, strengthening collective impact.
profile_positions.title: Country Director

company.name: The State University of New York

profile_positions.company: The State University of New York
profile_positions.description:
🌐 Conductor of  Dialogue in the Classroom: Teaching Contemporary World & European Affairs

🎓 Curriculum Innovator: Masterminded a compelling curriculum for the Contemporary World Affairs course, delving into pressing global problems and issues through an interdisciplinary lens. This dynamic course, delivered to a class of engaged students, had a specific focus on conflict situations, providing students with a nuanced understanding of global dynamics.

 European Affairs Specialist: Developed and taught an insightful Contemporary European Affairs course to a class of eager students. This course explored challenges facing contemporary European society from an interdisciplinary perspective, offering students a multifaceted view of the issues at hand. Notably, this course took a deep dive into the European Union's monetary and foreign policies, equipping students with valuable insights into this complex political and economic landscape.
profile_positions.title: Lecturer - Political Science

volunteer_experiences.description: 🌍 Empowering Refugee Families: Served as a dedicated mentor to newly arrived refugee families, providing vital support and guidance during their settlement process. Assisted with cultural acclimatization, navigation of bureaucratic procedures, educational support, and tackled various other resettlement challenges, enabling smoother transitions and fostering a sense of belonging and confidence within these families.
